title: MetaPath
heading: What Does MetaPath Do?
content: The MetaPath blockchain asset smart routing protocol integrates any tokenized asset (Cryptocurrencies, NFTs, GameFi). You can swap or transfer digital assets across platforms with ease, and users from any blockchain can purchase NFTs and GameFi items with any cryptocurrencies in a fast and safe process.

title: MetaPath
heading: How Does MetaPath Work?
content: MetaPath registers and discovers assets on the chain, monitors asset status and transaction behavior in real-time, establishes a dynamic routing table in the blockchain world, and bridges safe and efficient platforms/contracts through algorithmic splitting and step-by-step routing of transactions on the chain.
context:

title: MetaPath
heading: Is There A Fee to Use MetaPath?
content: There is NO FEE to connect your wallet to MetaPath and browse The Metaverse. Various transactions accrue fees based on the type of transaction and chain your process the transaction on. MetaPath, itself, collects fees only when you transact business.

title: MetaPath
heading: Why are Their Price Differences for Similar Transactions?
content: Cross-chain transactions sometimes have minimum thresholds, due to gas fees. The price difference you are seeing may be due to the limitations of the cross-chain swap or bridge we’ve integrated, and the minimum fees it is required to add.

heading: Why MetaPath?

All transactions on MetaPath are transparent and traceable.

MetaPath automatically finds the best rate for you.

title: MetaPath
heading: Tell me about MetaPath.
content: MetaPath is a cross-chain routing platform of blockchain assets, a metaverse cross-platform routing aggregator for Web3.0. MetaPath aggregates NFT marketplaces and GameFi exchanges into the blockchain ecosystem network, so users can not only swap between any two tokens, but also trade NFTs and GameFi items with any token. MetaPath also aggregates the mainstream DEXs and CEXs in the market, with high security, low risk, fast speed and best rate.MetaPath will lead the way in creating an integrated multi-chain future for cryptocurrencies and the metaverse they are building: path.finance (access with any wallet)

title: MetaPath
heading: About MetaPath
content: MetaPath is the leading and most-efficient decentralized finance platform in the universe. MetaPath is the pioneer and first cross-metaverse, cross-gamefi, cross-chain, and multi-platform next-level aggregator that connects metaverse and NFT marketplaces, public blockchain, DEXs, and cross-chain bridges with the ultimate purpose of connecting the economic systems of different GameFis by linking virtual assets Like NFTs in the virtual world, to realize the interoperability of the Metaverses.We are building two products – one is a platform called MetaPath platform and the other one is a protocol called Metapath Protocol. We have already built a MetaPath platform which will be a one-stop shop that will enable users to find the best route to exchange all crypto-related assets including fungible and NFT’s s in the metaverse. The MetaPath platform will connect them to all centralized and decentralized trading platforms including major cross chain bridges, nft marketplaces, gamefi exchanges.Initially, we will use API to connect them; in Phase II, we will use a new product called MetaPath Protocol. It is a blockchain asset routing protocol which aggregates not only cross-chain bridges and fungible tokens but also NFT marketplaces and Gamefi exchanges.The goal of the MetaPath team is to realize the interconnectivity of blockchain ecosystems where users can reliably swap or transfer any digital asset and get paid for every transaction.

title: MetaPath
heading: SWFT Blockchain
content: is a next-generation, cross-chain transfer platform, and payment network. SWFT Blockchain’s technology combines blockchain, machine learning, and big data to enable direct swaps between over 200 cryptocurrencies at record speeds. SWFT Blockchain’s cryptocurrency transfer platform and wallet app feature one-click in-wallet transfers, decentralized transfers, price limit orders, and payments using SWFT Pay; offering a fast, affordable, and secure cryptocurrency experience. SWFT Blockchain has received funding from top VCs, including Draper Dragon, and is in the first cohort of startups at Berkeley Blockchain Xcelerator.

title: MetaPath
heading: The core goal of MetaPath
content: The core goal of MetaPath is to establish the underlying infrastructure for the interconnection and interoperability of assets for blockchain ecological platforms such as Metaverse and GameFi. MetaPath registers and discovers assets on the chain, monitors asset status and transaction behavior in real-time, establishes a dynamic routing table in the blockchain world, and bridges safe and efficient platforms/contracts through algorithmic splitting and step-by-step routing of transactions on the chain. After completing the transaction, applications that comply with theMetaPath protocol can greatly reduce the difficulty of the transaction, shorten the user's transaction path, reduce transaction costs and improve security as much as possible.

MetaPath

After completing the transaction, applications that comply with theMetaPath protocol can greatly reduce the difficulty of the transaction, shorten the user's transaction path, reduce transaction costs and improve security as much as possible.

title: MetaPath
heading: MetaPath protocol
content: With the MetaPath smart contract routing protocol, MetaPath protocol can be integrated into the smart contract of cryptocurrencies, NFTs, Gamefi/Metaverse gears/items, and other tokenized assets through creating positioning and routing functions. Assets will be automatically included on the MetaPath chain, forming a Metaverse Cloud, an interconnected blockchain asset network that is open, transparent, and traceable.To be specific, from the application layer, MetaPath Protocol will enable smart contracts to communicate with each other, regardless of whether they are on the same blockchain.  From the infrastructure layer, smart contracts on different blockchains are linked with the Metaverse Cloud through MetaPath Routing Protocol. The infrastructure layer components include MetaPath Routing Protocol implemented on smart contracts, the message tree (Merkle Tree) to ensure the security of the messaging mechanism, off-chain components for coordination and matching, and the MetaPath Chain that carries the above data structures and smart contracts.

From the infrastructure layer, smart contracts on different blockchains are linked with the Metaverse Cloud through MetaPath Routing Protocol. title: MetaPath
heading: MetaPath aims to
content: MetaPath aims to design an inter-chain smart contract communication protocol where abundant resources will be provided to developers including APIs, documentation, and community support. By following the smart contract communication protocol, developers will be able to create DAPPs achieving inter-platform unity. To be specific, MetaPath designs and implements the interface standard of a communication protocol, which is compatible with various existing asset standards among different blockchains including ERC20 and ERC721. By importing the MetaPath contracts messaging standard, smart contracts of token or NFTs would be able to transfer their assets freely across platforms by invoking the registration and updating mechanism on the MetaPath chain.

title: MetaPath
heading: Business Model
content: The MetaPath smart contract routing protocol earns revenue in two ways. Firstly, 0.2% to 0.3% of transaction fees are collected for each routing. Secondly, fees are collected through the routing protocol.
